correspondence.message: I am a Data Engineering and Analytics master's student and I want to know if it's allowed to work on my thesis during my 6th semester but submit it in the 7th semester, considering that I will have 90 ECTS after my 5th semester."
If you have at least 90 ECTS by the end of your 5th semester, you may study 7 semesters and submit your thesis in your 7th semester, so you should be fine.
